sentence.Network_en: It'seems to me we have stood just about enough of this man's beggarly interference.
sentence.Network_cn: 我觉得我们差不多受够了这个人的无谓的干扰.

sentence.Network_en: Master Blifil called Tom a beggarly bastard.
sentence.Network_cn: 比利菲大师调用汤姆一乞丐杂种.

sentence.Network_en: When my beggarly heart sits crouched.
sentence.Network_cn: 当我乞丐似的心,蹲闭在屋角的时候.

2. used of sums of money; so small in amount as to deserve contempt
